!Hunters Guild Member Grey: You must gather *20 Karut Weeds*, used in the research of mages. The leto Lizardman mediums carry them. You may find the leto lizardmen in the southern part of Oren. Gathering information about the items is a part of the test. Count yourself lucky to have received this valuable one-time hint! [Quest _335_TheSongOfTheHunter 30744_04.htm|Go back]
